Participants.evidence: Patients who undergo surgery for severe TBI with placement of a subdural electrode strip will be eligible for enrollment.

Intervention.evidence: randomized 1:1 to either (1) standard care... or (2) a tiered intervention protocol...

Objective.evidence: The objective of this protocol is to determine the feasibility and efficacy of implementing a treatment protocol...

Blinding.evidence: standard care that is blinded to the further course of SDs

Harms.evidence: without increasing medical complications or adverse events.
